biz.gabrys.lesscss.extended.compiler

Interface ExtendedCompiler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CachingCompiledCodeExtendedCompiler, SimpleExtendedCompiler

    public interface ExtendedCompiler
    Wraps the native LessCSS Compiler expanding it with extra features.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String compile(LessSource source)
      Compiles a Less source to the CSS code with default options.
      String compile(LessSource source, CompilerOptions options)
      Compiles a Less source to the CSS code.

    • Method Detail

      • compile

        String compile(LessSource source)
        throws CompilerException
        Compiles a Less source to the CSS code with default options.
        Parameters:
        source - the source file.
        Returns:
        the CSS code.
        Throws:
        CompilerException - if an error occurred during compilation process.
        ExtendedCompilerException - if an error occurred during the execution of one of the elements of the extended mechanism.
        Since:
        1.0

      • compile

        String compile(LessSource source,
               CompilerOptions options)
        throws CompilerException
        Compiles a Less source to the CSS code.
        Parameters:
        source - the source file.
        options - the compiler options.
        Returns:
        the CSS code.
        Throws:
        CompilerException - if an error occurred during compilation process.
        ExtendedCompilerException - if an error occurred during the execution of one of the elements of the extended mechanism.
        Since:
        1.0
